ComicInfo.Summary:
In a realm where sorcery meets science, The Masters of the Universe set forth to protect all of Eternia from the evil onslaught of Skeletor and his evil forces. It's an epic tale of good versus evil, where there is new danger and suspense at every turn. The story we all loved from the 80's is reborn and re-launched for a new era. Evil-Lyn's plot surfaces as one of the most dangerous forces on the planet is about to be unleashed. With the power of Trap Jaw and Tri-Klops at her disposal, the outcome appears grim. Will the heroes of Eternia be able to stop them before it's too late, and will He-Man's fate be sealed in the process?
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 10:36:26. [CVDB188193]

ComicInfo.Characters: Evil-Lyn, He-Man, Man-At-Arms, Orko, Skeletor, Trap Jaw, Tri-Klops
ComicInfo.Teams: Evil Warriors, Masters of the Universe
